message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I can only pay $85 for it.
Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your interest in the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $87.50.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate it, but I can only pay $86 for the product.
Hi Bob, I understand you're trying to get the best deal. I'm willing to make a slight adjustment and sell the product to you for $88.
